summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1972 Budget of the Seattle Center Department; providing for payment of certain employees at appropriate hourly rates in lieu of granting excess accumulated compensatory time by increasing the allowance "Salaries" in the program category "Maintenance and Servicing of Facilities and Grounds" in the 1972 Budget of said Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
